title: Jest Run Mode Setting
markdownDescription: Schema for validating the jest.runMode setting in vscode. See details in [runMode](https://github.com/jest-community/vscode-jest#runmode)

jest.runMode.markdownDescription: Control when and how jest tests should be run. See details in [runMode](https://github.com/jest-community/vscode-jest#runmode)

oneOf.markdownDescription: A predefined Jest run mode. See details in [runMode](https://github.com/jest-community/vscode-jest#runmode)

type.description: Specifies the jest run mode type.

runAllTestsOnStartup.description: Specifies whether to run all tests on startup.

coverage.description: Specifies whether to collect and report coverage information.

revealOutput.description: Determines when to reveal the test run output.

clearOutputOnRun.description: Specify if to automatically clear output at the start of each test run

showInlineError.description: Specify if to enable inline error display in test file editor

integrateTestResultsTab.description: Specify if to let extension manage the 'TEST RESULTS' tab

deferred.description: Specifies whether the run mode is deferred.

testFileOnly.description: if true, will run tests only when saving test files.

else.errorMessage: The property 'testFileOnly' should only be present when 'type' is 'on-save'.

oneOf.markdownDescription: A detailed runMode configuration. See details in [runMode](https://github.com/jest-community/vscode-jest#runmode)
